p: This article has utilised content analysis as a research methodology in an attempt to do an in-depth analysis of the content of IDPs for Limpopoâ€™s seven most vulnerable municipalities in terms of climate change. The article examines the inclusion of climate change adaptation and mitigation strategies in the IDPs. The work is anchored on the principle that it is the responsibility of local municipalities to protect, assist and guide communities on how to adapt and mitigate the effects of climate change on their livelihood and sustainable development.
